title: Vin Scully, Broken Arms & Broke Backs | Daily Best of August 3 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Vin Scully, best known for his 67 seasons calling games for the Los Angeles Dodgers, passes away at the age of 94. An 80-year-old store clerk in California shoots a would-be robber's arm to pieces, thanks to the Second Amendment. Bubba gets lost looking for his car in a parking deck. The Biden administration contradicts itself as Nancy Pelosi departs from Taiwan. And, upon hearing about an upcoming "Roadhouse" remake, we debate whether it would be worse to play Ned Beatty's character in "Deliverance" or to play Jake Gyllenhaal's in "Brokeback Mountain."
